scripts.dev: concurrently -c auto "yarn --cwd components-library dev" "yarn --cwd mfe-characters dev" "yarn --cwd mfe-shell dev"
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf components-library/node_modules && rimraf mfe-characters/node_modules && rimraf mfe-shell/node_modules
scripts.test: yarn --cwd components-library test && yarn --cwd mfe-characters test
scripts.build: yarn --cwd components-library build && yarn --cwd mfe-characters build && yarn --cwd mfe-shell build
scripts.preview: concurrently -c auto "yarn --cwd mfe-characters preview" "yarn --cwd mfe-shell preview"
